sentences.sContent: Within amatory range, can I also be kind with you?
sentences.sContent_eng: Within amatory range, can I also be kind with you?
sentences.sCn: 在爱情的范围内，我也可以对你好吗？

sentences.sContent: Be that I have blotted out our amatory tender shoot with own hands.
sentences.sContent_eng: Be that I have blotted out our amatory tender shoot with own hands.
sentences.sCn: 无论如何，我已经遮住了我们与自己的双手恋爱的嫩芽。

sentences.sContent: Discretion, it goes without saying, is the cornerstone of long-term success in the amatory arts.
sentences.sContent_eng: Discretion, it goes without saying, is the cornerstone of long-term success in the amatory arts.
sentences.sCn: 慎重，不用说，这是在爱情艺术中长期的基础。
